pages.text: 76|26|Ara ratera kichu anse tamra prati sajdabanata hona ara ratera dirgha samaya tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna.
76|27|Niscaya tara bhalabase duniyara jibanake ara tara tadera samanera kathina dinake upeksa kare cale [1].
76|28|Amara taderake srsti karechi ebam tadera gathana sudrrha karechi. Ara amara yakhana icche karaba tadera sthane tadera mata (ka'uke) diye paribartana kare deba [1].
76|29|Niscaya eta eka upadesa, ata'eba ye icche kare se yena tara rabera dike ekati patha grahana kare.
76|30|Ara tomara icche karate saksama habe na yadi na allah icche karena. Niscaya allah sarbajna, prajnamaya.
76|31|Tini yake icche tamra anugrahera antarbhukta karena, kintu yalemara- tadera jan'ya tini prastuta rekhechena yantranadayaka sasti.
77|5|atahpara tadera, yara manusera antare paumche deya upadesa--- [1]
77|7|Niscaya tomaderake ye pratisruti deya hayeche ta abasyambhabi.
77|11|ara yakhana rasulaganake nirdharita samaye upasthita kara habe [1]
77|12|esaba sthagita rakha hayeche kon dinera jan'ya
77|14|Ara apanake kise janabe bicara dina ki
